_header: Would God that men might seen
_description: A song of the untrustworthiness of the world — five 6-line stanzas (aabaab)

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Wold god þat men myȝt seneHertys when þei
                    bene…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…Delyuer vs ouȝt with hys word& gravnt vs a good
                    ende
